'''Akema''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A Roparu who held a good job at the Luminous Bathhouse, but was fired for unprofessional behavior - gasping when she overheard a conversation she was supposed to be deaf to. Now she desperately looks for new employment in the Queen's Berth district, to avoid going back to [The Gullet](/theGullet/).
